name: The First Tomb
description:
Two archeologists are lost in the tomb, when searching for the costly artifact. And now their target is to find the parts of an artifact, that can kill the tomb spirit.

Controls:

WASD - red character movement

↑←↓→ - green character movement

E - wake the mate

Music: Time Travel  by Frank Schröter

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/6784-time-travel-

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Please, rate the game, because it is a submittion for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.
